title: Virtual Assistant
job_overview:
Hi there,

We are Upgrade to see actual info, a leading eCommerce brand in the home decor niche, and we are looking for a hardworking and reliable Virtual Assistant to join our growing team!

Position Details:
- Salary: 135,000 PHP per month + generous bonuses
- Schedule: 40 hours per week
- Work Hours: 9:00 AM â€“ 6:00 PM PHT (1 hour lunch break)
- Work Days: Monday to Friday

Your daily tasks will mainly involve using various tools to create AI-generated images and videos. No prior experience is required (we will provide full training on all necessary software).

At TwinklingTree, we value hard work- if you prove to us that you are a valuable member of the team, you will be promoted!

We will not be responding to direct messages. To be considered for this role, please complete the following application form: Upgrade to see actual info

Thank you for your time- we look forward to hearing from you!

Kind regards,
Cherish
TwinklingTree Team
